::Prowl::

Prowl looked straight into IR's eyes, his resolution on the city not weakening.

"The CF won't live through this battle," he says calmly to her, wishing that 
she wouldn't be such a *bleep* sometimes. "We'll need a base to repair, 
and construction might as well start now."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> * Iron Raptor looked into Prowl's eyes for a second before looking over 
her 
> shoulder at the battle that went on without her.
> < What kind of leader am I just to let them fight alone?> she thought to 
> herself, even though it would apprear in Prowl's mind as a whisper in the 
> back of his mind.
> And what was so important about this city idea that I couldn't wait until 
> the fight was over and people were more willing to listen?
> Iron scratched her cheek for a second before looking at her behind, eyes 
> narrowing when all the she saw was stray wires and sparks.
> < Perfect.>
> And without a second though she quickly transformed into robot mode, in 
the 
> same metal tank top she had been in before even though the armored 
leggings 
> and footings remained.
> Brushing herself off she looked at the battle again, then turning her head 
> to look at Prowl.
> What the hell were these guys doing talking about a city when they should 
be 
> helping in the fight.*
> 
> " You called me over here to discuss this slag?"
> 
> * She furrowed her brows.*
> 
> " I was busy trying to kick some bot butt back there and you stopped me 
to 
> talk about a stupid city? The idea hasn't even be approved yet and you're 
> alread going over some plan?"
> 
> * She had a look on her face like she couldn't even belive that they were 
> doing something so stupid.*
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
